name: pwpb
short_description: PWPB is a Bulletin Board (Forum) system, that allows anyone to setup a Forum/Board on their web site. Written with Perl, and requires only a standard Perl installation. Other Perl modules could be added/installed to enhance, or provide additional features, but are NOT required.
summary: PerlWatch Perl Boards - A bulletin Board system written with Perl.
